title: Man arrested for shooting 9-year-old multiple times in Canton
content:
CANTON, MS (Mississippi News Now) -
A man has been arrested after he shot into a Canton apartment complex, shooting a child multiple times.
According to Canton Police Chief Otha Brown, a 9-year-old, identified by family members at Emarion Williams, was shot multiple times at Canton Garden Apartments on Tuesday night. Larry Charles Carter, IV was taken into custody and charged with aggravated assault and shooting into a dwelling.
The child has been taken to the hospital but details of the child's condition have not yet been made available. Madison County investigators are handling the case.
We are working to gather more information.
